name: ExamSystem Workspace
description: This workspace documents the architecture of the ExamSystem system which enables managing of exams, signing up on the exams and communication between students and teachers.

relationships.description: Sends exam information to registered students

softwareSystems.name: ExamSystem
softwareSystems.description: Manages exams, registering students to exams and communication between students and teachers.

relationships.description: Sends prepared message data to show to user

components.name: Message Sender
components.description: Sends the message to the requested user

relationships.description: Request to send notification about the sent message

components.name: Notification Requester
components.description: Requests from notification service to send notification about sent message

components.name: Message Controller
components.description: Handles preparing data for the UI and preparing data to send the message

relationships.description: Gives message data to send to user
Sends prepared message data to show to user
Requests to store data to the database

components.name: Message Model
components.description: Handles getting and storing data from the database

relationships.description: Send handled requests back to handler
Send handled requests back to handler

containers.name: Exam Database
containers.description: Stores exams, exam registrations and messages

relationships.description: Provide data to back-end on demand

components.name: Notification Handler
components.description: Sends the notification messages and emails

relationships.description: Uses for actual sending of notifications

components.name: User Notification Manager UI
components.description: Provides the user with the ability to set user settings and create notifications

relationships.description: Sets up the settings for its behavior, uses for sending new messages

containers.name: Web App Front-end
containers.description: Provides user interface to authenticated users

Send notifications to students, modify notification settings
